prompt: Use case: photorealistic-natural. Asset type: mobile app onboarding hero image. Composition/framing: vertical portrait, medium-wide, subject centered, include environment around her, full background visible for top-of-screen hero crop. Constraints: no text, no logo, no watermark, no UI overlays, no frame, no blur vignette.
